snippet: The United States rebounded from a loss to Belarus with a victory over Denmark at the world championship and stayed on course for a spot in the quarterfinals.
abstract: United States beats Denmark, 1-0, at world championship in Ostrava, Czech Republic.
lead_paragraph: The United States rebounded from a loss to Belarus with a victory over Denmark at the world championship and stayed on course for a spot in the quarterfinals.

headline.main: Americans Edge Denmark in World Championship
